about_the_game:
Become a space engineer for XTEC, a greedy interplanetary corporation. Grab your converter gun and do what you are (to some degree) paid to do: Protect a giant laser drill from angry space monsters by constructing a deadly maze of towers and traps! Complete mining missions on various alien planets to unlock additional towers and upgrades. Assemble a crew of up to four players, combine the strengths of your different towers, and always remember: We are most definitely the good guys!

Key Features

  • Isometric 1-4 person online & couch co-op tower defense
  • No fixed paths: plan your defense maze carefully to get the most out of your towers
  • Unlock up to unique 42 towers and various upgrades, combine 7 different classes of towers for special attacks
  • Gather construction materials with care: A single hole in a tree line can create a dangerous shortcut for the attackers
  • Explore diverse environments from deserts, icy glaciers, volcanoes or simply weird alien biomes
  • Play through a coop-campaign with a light touch to narrative with humor, levity and sci-fi references.
  • Balanced gameplay for both newcomers and experts of co-op chaos

content_descriptors.notes: The game's main theme is the unlawful invasion of alien planets for resource theft and violence against alien species. The game displays these themes with dark humor.
